tool.name: EggNOG DB Download
tool.description: eggnog data to a specified directory

param.name: target_path
param.label: Download Destination
param.help: Full path to where the eggnod data should be installed.

tool.help:
This tool downloads eggnog data using download_eggnog_data.py and populates the data tables: eggnog_mapper_db_versioned. The data is located at: http://eggnog5.embl.de/download/emapperdb-5.0.2/ can vary from 1G to 80G in size.
The data will be downloaded to the specified directory. You should not mix eggnog data versions in the same directory.
